label: 宗廟
対訳語: The ancestral worship hall of the Tennō [Iwashimizu shrine].
説明文: A place to commemorate the spirits of the ancestors—especially those of the royal family. While Ise Shrine was primary shrine, Kamo and Iwashimizu shrines are also referred to as royal ancestral shrines. [天皇、石清水、伊勢神宮、賀茂]
